pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.2_0: the monks from the group of six were staying with the army for two or three nights. They went to see battles, troop reviews, the massing of the army, and troop inspections.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.3_0: One of the monks who went to a battle was even struck by an arrow.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.5_0: “We hope you had a good battle, Venerable. How many targets did you hit?”
